body:
Comment 2: 
This is a variant of issue #1505. After rewriting the AST, the position information is
incorrect; the position of the comment (// this won't work) is "inside" the rewritten
fmt.Println argument. Printing that code leads to an incorrect program.

Thus, this is not  go/parser or go/ast bug, but a go/printer issue. There is no easy
work-around for this in gofix.

Merged this issue with 1505.
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #1505._
